distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for glib2 fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed: 	  

- CVE-2019-12450: Fixed an improper file permission when copy operation
  takes place (bsc#1137001).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: file_copy_fallback in gio/gfile.c in GNOME GLib 2.15.0 through 2.61.1 does not properly restrict file permissions while a copy operation is in progress. Instead, default permissions are used.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
